MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra knew that an army without supplies would quickly fall, and the chance of meeting the Nikolaos|Wolf would be just within her grasp.'

General_Description: '''Crumble and Burn''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was tasked by [[Stentor]] to destroy valuable supplies belonging to the [[Athens|Athenians]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra made her way inland after her discussion with Stentor. She then infiltrated the [[Port of Nisaia]], where the supplies were located in.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The Port of Nisaia. If I'm going to find Athenian supplies this'll be the place.''
Further inside, she found what she was looking for.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Those blue supply crates with the white [[owl]] are the ones I need to destroy. A single fire arrow should do the trick.''
Section_Trivia: *This quest, alongside [[The Athenian Treasure Trove]] and [[One Man Army]], needs to completed in order to proceed to [[The Athenian Leader]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
